{"id":1096664524,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1699718815,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"30 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1096664524/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Distribute Candies Among Children II","memory":"6.4 MB","code":"#define ll long long\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ll distributeCandies(int n, int limit) {\n        ll validWays=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<=limit;i++) {\n            ll remaining=n-i,a=abs(remaining-limit);\n            if(a>limit) continue;\n            else validWays+=abs(limit-a)+1;\n        }\n        return validWays;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"distribute-candies-among-children-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
